title: FLT-Coq v0.3.0 — GlobalNormalization module and maximum-coverage API
description:
Coq formalization for a “global-normalization reading” of Fermat’s Last Theorem (FLT).
The module `GlobalNormalization` concentrates the public API (e.g. `covers_with`,
`maximum_coverage_as_theorem`, and corollaries for FLT) while marking the auxiliary
lemmas `#[local]` to keep the surface minimal.

This record corresponds to the GitHub release tag v0.3.0 and supersedes v0.2.0.
